Active.description: The subscription status.  The status is active by default.

ClientID.description: Read Only after creation. The client id of the subscriber.

LastCheckin.description: ReadOnly. The timestamp of the last checkin.

RelationshipID.description: Read Only after creation. The relationship id.  A relationship id will be assigned if not provided on creation.

UpdateGroupID.description: Read Only after creation. The update group to subscribe to.
